title: Jeremy Renner takes you behind the scenes at "Captain America: Civil W
title_page: Jeremy Renner takes you behind the scenes at "Captain America: Civil W
text:
Jeremy Renner has been in town working on the Marvel project "Captain America: Civil War" and has found a little time to share a peek or two from the set.
Renner has spent time in Atlanta before, filming last year's "Kill the Messenger" here. My interview with director Michael Cuesta is here.
(Full coverage of "Captain America: Civil War" below!)
Jeremy Renner at the "Captain America: Civil War" set. Photo: Atlanta Filming
"On set. Behind the scene. #civilwar #captainamerica #hawkeye this set is amazing," he posted.
He definitely had his game face on to suit up as Clint Barton / Hawkeye.
And it looks like he had fun during his downtime!
